name: Invasive Broodfish
text:
{1}{G}, {t}: Create a 1/1 green Fish creature token.
Flood {2}{g}{g} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{g}{g} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)
While Invasive Broodfish is flooding a land, that land gains "Whenever this land becomes tapped, each opponent creates a 1/1 green Fish creature token."
